name: 1-Bit Escape (Hellfansing)
description:
You wake up in a colorless room, in a bed that is far too small. Find the key to break out of the 1-bit escape room. 

A five minute escape adventure made with GB Studio. 

Controls:

[directional pad] - [W, A, S, D]

Interaction:

[Start] - [Enter]

[A] - [J] 

Have fun!
